cause.description:
It is just CRUEL to leave your animal in a car when there are extreme heat conditions! This can cause heat stroke, BRAIN damage! Difficulty breathing!! And soo many other dangers!!!!
http://www.torontohumanesociety.com/newsandevents/stories/2007/07-08a.asp
***PLEASE REPORT ANYONE YOU SEE WHO HAS LEFT THEIR ANIMAL IN THERE CAR DIRECTLY TO THE HUMANE SOCIETY AT 416. 392. 2273 2183 OR 416. 392. 9992 AND THEN PRESS "9".***
CITY NEWS: http://www.citynews.ca/news/news_13345.aspx
CTV NEWS: http://toronto.ctv.ca/servlet/an/local/CTVNews/20070801/pet_safety_070801/20070801?hub=TorontoHome
GLOBAL NEWS: http://www.canada.com/globaltv/ontario/video/index.html CLICK "HUMANE BEHAVIOUR".
TORONTO HUMANE SOCIETY: http://www.torontohumanesociety.com/
**TO REPORT A CASE OF ANY KIND OF ANIMAL CRUELTY PLEASE CALL 416. 392. 2273 EXT 2183 OR 416. 392. 9992 AND THEN PRESS "9". **
*TORONTO CRIME STOPPERS- 1-800- 222-TIPS*
PLEASE SIGN THE PETITION AS WELL :
http://www.petitiononline.com/ths0708/petition.html
1. ANIMALS HAVE A RIGHT TO LIFE JUST AS WE DO.
2. WOULD YOU LEAVE YOUR CHILD IN A CAR LIKE THAT?
3. ANIMAL CRUELTY IS JUST UNACCEPTABLE.
cause.mission: STOP LEAVING PETS IN A CAR WHEN IT IS 30 DEGREES OUT!
cause.name: HOW DARE YOU LEAVE YOUR ANIMAL IN THE CAR WHEN IT IS VERY HOT OR VERY COLD OUT!
